title: Tromb T1 Gold Watch Face
summary: Beautiful and lightweight, the perfect watchface to show everybody your style.
description: Beautiful and lightweight, the perfect watchface to show everybody your style.It is battery friendly without loosing style and features.-Neat design.-Realistic and smooth reflections based on movement.-Constant upgrades adding new features.-Realistic seconds hand movement (physically accurate, based on force law).-Date dial.-Battery dial.UPCOMING:-Square smartwatch redesign.-Customizable Dials.-Presets.-Interactive watchface (chronometer).Compatible with any smartwatch, optimized to be as lightweight as possible
descriptionHTML:
Beautiful and lightweight, the perfect watchface to show everybody your style.

It is battery friendly without loosing style and features.

-Neat design.
-Realistic and smooth reflections based on movement.
-Constant upgrades adding new features.
-Realistic seconds hand movement (physically accurate, based on force law).

-Date dial.
-Battery dial.

UPCOMING:
-Square smartwatch redesign.
-Customizable Dials.
-Presets.
-Interactive watchface (chronometer).

Compatible with any smartwatch, optimized to be as lightweight as possible
comments: Best watchface Best I've found so far. Definitely worth a dollar. Great job dev!
recentChanges: -Fixed wrong day number (was one day ahead sorry lol)
